pages.text: Acid cloud creates a poisonous, vitriolic mist in a doughnut-shape around you, which moves as you move, damaging any entity it touches.$(br2)Modifiers allow for a variety of options, including mixing clouds of flame, increasing your movement speed, and more.$(br2)$(warning) Unless modified, your movement speed will be slowed while channeling.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:acid_cloud/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Damage:$() The spell deals $(spell:acid_cloud/HEART/damage) hearts of damage to up to $(spell:acid_cloud/damage_count) entities when it ticks.$(br2)$(br2)$(bold)Radius:$() The configured default radius of the spell is $(spell:acid_cloud/radius_general) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Radius Boost:$() When the $(modifier:radius_boost)$() modifier is enabled, the radius is increased again by $(spell:acid_cloud/radius_boost) blocks.

$(bold)Poison:$() Enemies are afflicted with Poison $(spell:acid_cloud/ROMAN/poison_amplification) for $(spell:acid_cloud/SECONDS/poison_duration)$() seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Fire:$() With the $(modifier:fire_cloud)$() modifier enabled, enemies are set ablaze for $(spell:acid_cloud/fire_duration) seconds and part of the damage is dealt as fire damage.$(br2)$(bold)Night:$() With the $(modifier:moonfall)$() modifier enabled, damage is increased by $(spell:acid_cloud/PERCENT/night_modifier_low) at sunset, increasing to $(spell:acid_cloud/PERCENT/night_modifier_high) at midnight, before decreasing again until dawn.

$(bold)Undead$(): With the $(modifier:unholy_vanquisher)$() modifier, an additional $(spell:acid_cloud/HEART/undead_damage) damage is dealt to undead creatures.$(br2)$(bold)Healing:$() With the $(modifier:healing_cloud)$() modifier, $(bold)no damage is dealt$(), but up to $(spell:acid_cloud/healing_count) non-hostile creatures nearby are healed for $(spell:acid_cloud/HEART/healing) hearts and given Regeneration $(spell:acid_cloud/ROMAN/regeneration_amplifier) for $(spell:acid_cloud/SECONDS/regeneration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Slow:$() With the $(modifier:slowing)$() modifier enabled, entities are given Slowness $(spell:acid_cloud/ROMAN/slow_amplifier) for $(spell:acid_cloud/SECONDS/slow_duration) seconds.

$(bold)Underwater:$() With the $(modifier:underwater_increase)$() modifier, damage dealt while underwater is increased by $(spell:acid_cloud/PERCENT/underwater_boost).$(br2)$(bold)Weakness:$() With the $(modifier:weakening_cloud)$() modifier, affected entities are given Weakness $(spell:acid_cloud/ROMAN/weakness_amplifier) for $(spell:acid_cloud/SECONDS/weakness_duration).$(br2)$(bold)Peaceful:$() With the $(modifier:peaceful_cloud)$() modifier, only hostile entities are affected.
